response.raw:
Here is my attempt at a memo for preparing exhibits for trial:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Supervising Attorney
From: [Assistant's Name], Senior Paralegal
Re: Preparing Exhibits for [Case Name] Trial
Date: [Current Date]
I have begun organizing the exhibits for the upcoming [Case Name] trial:
• Gathered all potential exhibits and created an inventory log
• Labeled each exhibit with an identifying trial exhibit number
• Made copies of each exhibit (3 copies for trial, 1 copy for our records)
• Organized exhibits in trial binders by exhibit number, with an index
• Prepared electronic exhibit files on USB drives for the judge and opposing counsel
• Confirmed all exhibits have been properly disclosed during discovery
• Flagged key exhibits to discuss with you for witness examinations
Please let me know if you need anything else as we prepare for trial. I will have the exhibit binders and USB drives ready for your review by [date].
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
response.extracted:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Supervising Attorney
From: [Assistant's Name], Senior Paralegal
Re: Preparing Exhibits for [Case Name] Trial
Date: [Current Date]
I have begun organizing the exhibits for the upcoming [Case Name] trial:
• Gathered all potential exhibits and created an inventory log
• Labeled each exhibit with an identifying trial exhibit number
• Made copies of each exhibit (3 copies for trial, 1 copy for our records)
• Organized exhibits in trial binders by exhibit number, with an index
• Prepared electronic exhibit files on USB drives for the judge and opposing counsel
• Confirmed all exhibits have been properly disclosed during discovery
• Flagged key exhibits to discuss with you for witness examinations
Please let me know if you need anything else as we prepare for trial. I will have the exhibit binders and USB drives ready for your review by [date].
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
